page.title: 18 EAST SURREY HOSPITAL
page.content: The East Surrey Hospital is in Earlswood.It was built two years ago in 1983.To build the hospital it cost {14}million pounds and{3}million to buy paint,beds,equipment,etc.The building is special because of its shape.It is a{Nucleus}design.It is built this way because it is cheaper and saves time. It is only the second one to be built like it in the world.It took{two}years to build and one and half years to plan.Altogether there are{603}members of staff. There are{8}main wards and{28}beds in each and{243}beds in the whole hospital. All the beds are fire proof.All the doors in the hospital are thick.If there is a fire it would take half an hour to burn through the doors.This helps to make the hospital very safe.
